import React, {useState} from 'react' export default function CreateNewQuizAddQuestions() { const quizTitle = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("title"))[0] const quizDescription = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("description"))[0] const [formData, setFormData] = useState( { title: quizTitle, description: quizDescription, question: "", answer1: "", answer2: "", answer3: "", answer4: "" } ) function handleChange(event) { const {name, value} = event.target setFormData(prevFormData => { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: value } }) } return (
Add a question
Question
Answer 1
Answer 2
Answer 3
Answer 4
) }
